sentences.english: In God' s eyes, true greatness is serving others.
sentences.chinese: 在上帝眼里，服事他人才不枉此生。

sentences.english: Let me more happy, also be to the human world trip.
sentences.chinese: 让自己多点开心点，也不枉为来人世间旅行一趟。

sentences.english: Love, is the reason why we won't feel sorry for our lift.
sentences.chinese: 爱，就是让我们不枉活一世的理由。

sentences.english: What's more, the exchange of ideas spurred by those errors more than justify the time involved.
sentences.chinese: 而且，这些错误激发的思考也不枉浪费的时间。

sentences.english: All say youth, to do a foolish thing, don't waste our was once young.
sentences.chinese: 都说青春，要做几件傻事，才不枉我们也曾年轻过。

sentences.english: His outstanding performance makes him worthy of your cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 业绩这么好，也不枉你对他的培养。

sentences.english: Even if pesters the day of death, Makes contact with the life, Also has been unable not in vain the time which turns head.
sentences.chinese: 即使纠缠终日，搭上生命，也不枉了无法回头的光阴。

sentences.english: You must be happy, I will withdraw distressedly.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要幸福，才不枉我狼狈退出。

sentences.english: Love is the reason why we won't feel sorry for our life.
sentences.chinese: 爱，就是让我们不枉活一世的理由。

sentences.english: If the time is prefer always accordingly peaceful and, the this present life doesn't garbage a degree as well.
sentences.chinese: 若是光阴一直如此安谧宁和，此生也不枉度。

definition: to waste (one's breath, one's energy etc)/to try in vain
not to let sb down/to treat sb fairly/be worthy of
to have a clear conscience/to feel no qualms
the trip has not been made in vain/the trip has been well worthwhile/it's been a worthwhile trip
painstaking effort/to take a lot of trouble/laborious at pains
not more than so-so (idiom); mediocre/nothing out of the ordinary
to be ashamed to face (sb)/to feel bad about having failed (sb)
to make painstaking efforts (idiom); after much trouble/to work hard at sth
(idiom) a good person, used to praise sb's moral integrity or courage
